Thoracic endovascular aortic repair (TEVAR) stent graft
Atrial or ventricular septal defect closure device
Cardiac rhythm management device (pacemaker, ICD, CRT) generator and leads
Central venous access catheter (PICC, port, tunneled line)
Evidence of prior lung resection (lobectomy, segmentectomy, pneumonectomy, wedge resection)
Evidence of prior thoracotomy/thoracoscopy (rib changes, clips)
Shoulder arthroplasty (humeral head replacement, total shoulder replacement)
Healed fractures (ribs, clavicle, sternum, spine, humerus)
Surgical clips/markers (breast parenchyma, axilla, thyroid bed, other)
Neurostimulator device (vagal nerve, spinal cord, deep brain stimulator components)
Retained foreign bodies (e.g., bullet fragments, shrapnel)
